hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Bakr Siddiq said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) told us: 'Dajjal will emerge in a land in the east called Khorasan, and will be followed by people with faces like hammered shields

chapter.ara-name: باب فِتْنَةِ الدَّجَّالِ وَخُرُوجِ عِيسَى ابْنِ مَرْيَمَ وَخُرُوجِ يَأْجُوجَ وَمَأْجُوجَ
chapter.eng-name: The tribulation of Dajjal, the emergence of 'Esa bin Maryam and the emergence of Gog and Magog
